item.description:
Tailgating in style with the polo ponies and their friends.  We'll pot luck a picnic feast and learn to stomp the divots back in the ground at half-time.  Cell number will be sent out to the group so we can find one another in case by some accident we actually blend in with the crowd and are hard to find. This meet is the Harvard / Yale Cup. Gates open at 1:30 - the game is at 3pm but we plan to picnic on the lawn.

Admission is $10 per person.

Please bring $5 for the meetup kitty to help us pay to keep this group running.

http://www.myopiapolo.org/info.html
item.how_to_find_us: Come early if you can. We'll establish a picnic spot and some cell phone # contacts.

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: Polo and tailgating: Myopia Hunt Club
